channel.title: API-testing on QA Discovery
channel.description: Recent content in API-testing on QA Discovery

item.title: Introducing Bruno for Replacement Postman
item.description: Since Postman announced in May 2023 that it will phase out the Scratch Pad model with offline capabilities, teams that need to isolate API workspace data from third-party servers have been looking for alternatives. Teams that need to isolate API workspace data from third-party servers have had to look for alternatives. bruno is one of those alternatives: an open source desktop application designed for API testing, development, and debugging. Bruno
